item.title: Regular Expressions in Python
item.description: Hello! This semester I’ve been taking a class in which I’ve learned a little bit of Python, and I’d like to share some of what I learned, particularly regular expressions! Regular expressions are a sequence of characters that allow you to find matches in text. import re x="abc aac ac acb bac 1a6" re.findall(r"a.",x) ## ['ab', 'aa', 'ac', 'ac', 'ac', 'a6'] In the code above “a.” returns “a” and any character that follows the “a”.
